PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02392024-03-25NRCAN
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisDesignation of TIMOTHY A. BERUBE of Thunder Bay, Ontario, to act as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on September 27, 2024, or until such time as a new President is designated, whichever occurs first, effective March 30, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Designation of TIMOTHY A.
